name: Driving Prototype
description:
Racing Prototype
This game is just a prototype, I am currently working on the driving physics. I don't have a name for the game since the main mechanics have not yet been decided. The features I would like to add are cars that can be upgraded and parts that can be switched out. I am also considering adding weapons to the vehicles which would make the game a mix of combat and racing.

The controls are very simple for now.
WASD or the arrow keys for left/right and up/down.

That's it for now, I hope you enjoy it!
